message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SI 

The paper proposes a modification to the Broad Learning System (BLS) algorithm, which is a machine learning method used for regression and classification problems. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the use of the maximum correntropy criterion (MCC) to train the output weights, which is a statistical measure of similarity between two random variables. This suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The experiments conducted in the paper involve regression and classification datasets, which could also place it under cs.CV (Computer Vision) or cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
